EmailTemplate.name: FSL_Form_Template_Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Required: Form to be published
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Administrator,
The following Template has been revised and needs your approval to be published for usage within Guidanz Work Orders: Template Name: {!disco__Form_Template__c.Name} Revised By: {!disco__Form_Template__c.OwnerFullName} To review this request, click the button below.
Login
Sincerely, Cummins Inc.
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
